quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Life is like a coin. You can spend it any way you wish, but you only spend it once.
quotes.author: Lillian Dickson

quotes.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: If you love life, don’t waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
